Package controller

Class HDBOfficerController

java.lang.Object
controller.ApplicantController
controller.HDBOfficerController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ViewProjectInterface
public class HDBOfficerController extends ApplicantController implements ViewProjectInterface
Controller class for HDB Officer operations in the BTO application system. Extends ApplicantController to inherit applicant functionality while implementing ViewProjectInterface for project viewing capabilities. This class provides officer-specific functionality such as project management, application bookings, and handling successful applications.

  • Method Details

    • viewProject

      public void viewProject(User user)
      Displays available projects and provides filtering options. Implements the ViewProjectInterface method to allow officers to view and filter BTO projects based on neighborhood and flat type criteria.
      Specified by:
      viewProject in interface ViewProjectInterface
      Overrides:
      viewProject in class ApplicantController
      Parameters:
      user - The officer user viewing the projects

    • listProject

      public List<Project> listProject(Officer officer, String neighbourhoodFilter, FlatType flatTypeFilter)
      Retrieves a filtered list of projects based on specified criteria. Filters projects by officer access, neighborhood, and flat type.
      Parameters:
      officer - The officer user for whom to list projects
      neighbourhoodFilter - The neighborhood to filter by (null for no filter)
      flatTypeFilter - The flat type to filter by (null for no filter)
      Returns:
      A filtered list of Project objects matching the criteria

    • printProjectList

      public void printProjectList(List<Project> projects, FlatType flatTypeFilter)
      Displays a formatted table of projects with their details. Shows project ID, name, neighborhood, application dates, visibility, officer slots, manager ID, officers assigned, and flat type information.
      Parameters:
      projects - The list of projects to display
      flatTypeFilter - Optional filter to display only specific flat types (null for all)

    • submitApplication

      public void submitApplication(User user)
      Delegates to the applicant controller to submit an application. Allows officers to submit applications using the inherited functionality.
      Overrides:
      submitApplication in class ApplicantController
      Parameters:
      user - The user (officer) submitting the application

    • getSuccessfulApplicationsForOfficerProject

      public List<Application> getSuccessfulApplicationsForOfficerProject(User user)
      Finds successful applications for the project the officer is in charge of. Retrieves applications that are marked as SUCCESSFUL and not pending withdrawal.
      Parameters:
      user - The officer user
      Returns:
      List of successful applications for the officer's assigned project

    • bookBTO

      public void bookBTO(User user)
      Allows an officer to book a BTO flat for successful applicants. Displays successful applications, allows selection, verifies unit availability, updates application status to BOOKED, and generates a receipt.
      Parameters:
      user - The officer user performing the booking
